alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 6:51AM MST until December 30 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 2 inches with the highest snow totals above 2200 feet. Locally higher accumulations for portions of the Palouse...Highway 195 eastward with 1 to 3 inches of snow possible. * WHERE...Cheney, Rosalia, Airway Heights, Plummer, Moscow, Tekoa, Davenport, Colfax, Genesee, Post Falls, Hayden, Spokane Valley, Oakesdale, Uniontown, Pullman, Fairfield, Downtown Spokane, Coeur d`Alene, Rockford, La Crosse, Worley, and Potlatch. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
